name: ITC1100 Team 4 - Receipt Pal High Fidelity Prototype 2
description:
Step-by-step Instructions


Registration Process (New User)

 

  1. The app opens to the “Receipt Pal” splash screen
  2. Click “Get started”
  3. Enter your full name, email, and create a password OR sign up using one of the available platforms…google, apple, or Facebook (these buttons are shallow designs you cannot click them)
  4. Click “Register” to continue to the tutorial screen…after reading the tutorial screen steps, click the bottom right hand arrow button to view a video tutorial (video is shallow, does not work)
  5. Click the bottom right hand arrow button to take your first snap of a receipt 
  6. Click the capture button to take a picture and be directed to “Receipts” to store your receipt OR 
  7. Click the “x” cancel button to be redirected to the app home screen (just in case you notice you have the wrong receipt or want to take a picture later!)…to access the camera again you can always click the camera icon located in the bottom right hand corner of your Receipt Pal home screen 
  8. From the home screen you can access receipts, discounts, weekly spending, and your shopping lists (you can click each of these buttons/folders!)
  9. In your receipts folder you will find two additional buttons…the add button (to create a new folder) and the time sensitive folder (your receipts that will be expiring soon)…both of these buttons are shallow parts 

 

Login Process (Returning User)

 

  1. Launch “Receipt Pal” from your phone!
  2. Click get started to be redirected to the login screen…(note: if you are redownloading the app or accessing the app from a new device you can also click “Already Member” to login to your existing account 
  3. Input your login information (email and password), use the FaceId feature or login using your thumbprint 
  4. Click login and you will be welcomed to your “Receipt Pal” home screen! 

 

Description of Shallow Parts:

 

  1. The Settings button on your home screen is a shallow feature that does not yet work 
  2. Your “Sort By” drop down menu buttons are shallow on each screen (i.e. you cannot select the “sort by” feature in the “my receipts” screen)
  3. The “Forgot Password” and “Remember Me” on your login screen
  4. Clicking on the Google, Facebook, and Apple icon will not redirect you to sign up 
  5. The video tutorial cannot be clicked to watch a tutorial
  6. The add button (to create a new folder) and the time sensitive folder in the app “My Receipts” screen
